title: CommBoards AAC speech asistant
text:
Every day we offer FREE licensed iOS apps and games youâ€™d have to buy otherwise.
CommBoards AAC speech asistant
is available as a Giveaway of the day!
You have limited time to download, install and register it.
Unlock the power of communication with CommBoards - an award-winning AAC (Augmentative and Alternative Communication) app designed for individuals with speech impairments. Whether it's due to autism, cerebral palsy, or other verbal disabilities, CommBoards offers a voice to those who need it most.
Empower Expression with Customizable Boards:
Personalized Imagery: Easily upload images that resonate with your personal experiences, making communication more intuitive and impactful.
Unique Voice Recordings: Record messages in your own voice or that of loved ones, bringing a personal touch to every interaction.
Limitless Customization: With an unrestricted number of boards and cells, tailor your communication setup to fit the complexity of your thoughts and needs seamlessly.
Intuitive Interface, Tailored Experience:
User-Centric Design: Adjust every aspect of CommBoards, from button sizes and board layouts to color schemes, ensuring accessibility and ease of use.
Versatile Use Cases: Ideal for children and adults with autism, speech therapists, and special education professionals, CommBoards is a dynamic tool that adapts to diverse communicative contexts.
Trusted Globally:
Join a worldwide community that has embraced CommBoards as their go-to AAC assistant. Celebrated for fostering independence and enhancing social interaction, CommBoards is not just an app; it's a gateway to self-expression and connection.
Enhance your communicative experience with CommBoards - where every voice is heard, and every word matters.
Dana Fridman
Education
